```{r setup}
library('phers')
library('data.table')

# doParallel::registerDoParallel() # register a parallel backend to minimize runtime
```

```{r}
demoSample = data.table(
  person_id = 1:5,
  sex = c('F', 'M', 'M', 'F', 'F'))

icdSample = data.table(
  person_id = c(rep(1L, 3), rep(2L, 3), rep(3L, 2), 4),
  icd = c('365', '366', '734', '524.0', '718.4', '441', '366', '734', '441'),
  flag = 9)
```

```{r}
# map ICD codes to phecodes
phecodeOccurrences = getPhecodeOccurrences(icdSample)

# calculate weights 
weights = getWeights(demoSample, phecodeOccurrences)

# vector of OMIM disease IDs to calculate PheRS for
diseaseIds = 154700

# mape diseases to phecodes
diseasePhecodeMap = mapDiseaseToPhecode(diseaseIds)

# calculate PheRS
getScores(demoSample, phecodeOccurrences, weights, diseasePhecodeMap)
```
